prompt_response.prompt: How do I install the Netra SDK?
prompt_response.response: It's very simple! All you need is a Netra account and the API key with a supported MCP-compliant editor like Windsurf or Cursor. Add a configuration file to the editor's parent directory that connects to the Netra MCP endpoint at https://mcp.netrasystems.ai/v1
